sn1.37:7.1: BB evidently reads khila here. But it seems to me more likely to be a synonym for paligha, i.e. khīla
sn1.37:7.2: A village ([pli-tv-bu-vb-pj2:3.8]]()) or royal compound ([pli-tv-bu-vb-pc83:1.3.56.1]()) was marked with a “boundary post” (_indakhīla_). It symbolized a fixed and immovable point, either in a good sense ([sn56.39:4.1]()) or, as here, an obstacle.
